item.title: Pneumococcus
item.description: Streptococcus pnuemoniae, affectionately known as Pnuemoccus, is a major cause of bacterial pneumonia. It is the second leading cause of meningitis behind Nieseria and causes other types

item.title: Central Dogma

item.title: Reproduction Rates
item.description: The power of exponential growthThere is an old Chinese proverb that explains the power of exponential growth. There was once a rich and powerful man who was riding a large horse near the lake shore.

item.title: Frankenfoods
